name: Flu Shot Shortage (10 player)
descr: Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 10-player mode.
tooltip:
Flu Shot Shortage (10 player)

Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 10-player mode.
